en: Give the king thy judgments, O God, And thy righteousness unto the king’s son.
hmr: Aw Pathien, i rorêlnahai chu lal kuomah pe la, I felna chu lal naupa kuomah pe rawh.

en: He will judge thy people with righteousness, And thy poor with justice.
hmr: I mihai chu felnain ro rêlpêk a ta, I mi rimsihai chu rorêlna felin ro rêlpêk a tih.

en: The mountains shall bring peace to the people, And the hills, in righteousness.
hmr: Tlâng lien le tlâng chînhai hin felnain Mihai kuomah lungmuongna hung intlun an tih.

en: He will judge the poor of the people, He will save the children of the needy, And will break in pieces the oppressor.
hmr: Ama chun mi laia rimsihai chu ro rêlpêk a ta, Pase nauhai chu sandam a ta, Nêksâwrtu ruok chu suknâwi a tih.

en: They shall fear thee while the sun endureth, And so long as the moon, throughout all generations.
hmr: Nisa khi a um sûng phawt chu ṭîng an ti cheh a, Thla um sûng po khawmin, suon um sûng po po chun.

en: He will come down like rain upon the mown grass, As showers that water the earth.
hmr: Ama chu hlobet râwtna chunga ruotui tla angin tlâng a ta, Hnuoi châwmtu ruotui ang elin.

en: In his days shall the righteous flourish, And abundance of peace, till the moon be no more.
hmr: A dam lai chun mi felhai chu inno hlut hlut an ta, Thla um naw hma khat chun, lungmuongna nasatak um a tih.

en: He shall have dominion also from sea to sea, And from the River unto the ends of the earth.
hmr: Ama chun tuisuorieta inthawka tuisuoriet dang chenin ramawp nei a ta, Vadungpuia inthawka kâwlkawdawng chen khawmin.

en: They that dwell in the wilderness shall bow before him; And his enemies shall lick the dust.
hmr: Thlalêra umhai chu a hmaah kûn an ta, Ama dotuhai chun pilvut liek an tih.

en: The kings of Tarshish and of the isles shall render tribute: The kings of Sheba and Seba shall offer gifts.
hmr: Tarsis ram le thlierkâra lalhaiin lâwmman hung chawi an ta, Seba le Sheba ram lalhaiin thilpêk hung inhlân bawk an tih.

en: Yea, all kings shall fall down before him; All nations shall serve him.
hmr: Anih, lal po po chu a hmaah bawkkhup an ta, Hnam tinrêngin a rawng bâwl an tih.

en: For he will deliver the needy when he crieth, And the poor, that hath no helper.
hmr: Pasiein a koin ama chun sanhim a ta, Mi rimsi ṭhangpuitu nei naw khawm chu sanhim a tih.

en: He will have pity on the poor and needy, And the souls of the needy he will save.
hmr: Mi rimsi le pasiehai chu lunginsiet a ta, Pasiehai hringna chu sandam a tih.

en: He will redeem their soul from oppression and violence; And precious will their blood be in his sight:
hmr: An hringna chu nêksâwrna le nunsietnaa inthawkin intlan a ta, An thisen chu ama ngai chun hlutak a ni ding a ni sih a.

en: And they shall live; and to him shall be given of the gold of Sheba: And men shall pray for him continually; They shall bless him all the day long.
hmr: Chun, hring an ta, Sheba ram rângkachak chu a kuoma pêk nîng a tih, Mihaiin ama chu ṭawngṭâipêk rawp an ta, Sûnnithlâkin mal sâwmpêk an tih.

en: There shall be abundance of grain in the earth upon the top of the mountains; The fruit thereof shall shake like Lebanon: And they of the city shall flourish like grass of the earth.
hmr: Hnuoiah, tlâng chungahai hin bu tamtak um a ta, A vui chu Lebanon angin inhnîng suou suou a ta, Khuoa mihai chu hnuoi hlobet angin inno hlut hlut an tih.

en: His name shall endure for ever; His name shall be continued as long as the sun: And men shall be blessed in him; All nations shall call him happy.
hmr: A hming chu kumkhawtluongin dei naw nih a. A hming chu ama a um sûng chu dei loin um pei a ta, Mihai chu amaa chun malsâwmin um an ta, Hnam tinrêngin ama chu hamṭha tîng an tih,

en: Blessed be Jehovah God, the God of Israel, Who only doeth wondrous things:
hmr: LALPA Pathien, Israelhai Pathien chu inpâkin um raw se, Ama chau hin thilmak a thaw hlak a.

en: And blessed be his glorious name for ever; And let the whole earth be filled with his glory. Amen, and Amen.
hmr: A hming ropuitak hi kumkhawtluongin inpâkin um bawk sienla, Hnuoi pumpui khawm hi a ropuinaa suksipin um raw se; Amen, Amen.

en: The prayers of David the son of Jesse are ended.
hmr: Jessai naupa David ṭawngṭâi- nahai chu a tâwp tah.
